title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: We need more people to join and share our channel.After when its payed channel those who helping us now to grow will get free membership.Also anyone who share our channel will get free membership when its payed channel so share in fb ig and other places our telegram pump channel.We aim to be biggest pump channel binance futures signals.How it works?You wait for signal and we pump and once outsiders coming in to see our coin pumping we can dump on them outsiders are othet traders whos not our pump channel but they coin pumping so they fomo in but everybody whos in our pump channel will know when we dump it.Lets grow and evolve together.Join with us Â telegram channel link:https://t.me/pumptimer

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: How do you even know that a hundred people would be enough for that job? I don't think it would be enough unless your goal is to sell within the group or become opposite of what you tell the group or something?Wouldn't there be a minimum balance as well or something?

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: This is how pump and dump group works, they are trying to manipulate the market and this should be a warning to those who are still believing on a pump and dump group or any signal group. Looking for a members that can help you scam ordinary investors? Well this may not look scam but the main purpose of this group is quiet suspicious. Again, be careful everyone.

comments.author: 325btc
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on July 23, 2022, 08:08:04 PMHow do you even know that a hundred people would be enough for that job? I don't think it would be enough unless your goal is to sell within the group or become opposite of what you tell the group or something?Wouldn't there be a minimum balance as well or something?Well then lets get some more people like 5k 10k people

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: So you want to play a pump dump game? If so very likely it's out of your hand. Who needs to post to get members from the forum to increase channels subscriber he won't do it. Because the forum users aren't much interested in your scheme. Building such as channel isn't an easy task at all. You should have all real traders who will follow you blindly. You have to find some other way to build your channel to provide the signal.
